short_summary: Repair and Overhaul Chassis Hydraulic and Mechanical Components for DND
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 2 2024 at 14:00:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared nonresponsive. This solicitation is for Repair and Overhaul Chassis Hydraulic and Mechanical Components for DND.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Reference and Solicitation Information:

* **Reference Number**: WS4374525333-Doc4546442593
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4374525333
* **Amendment Number**: 5

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Title (English)**: Repair and Overhaul Chassis Hydraulic and Mechanical Components for DND
* **Tender Title (French)**: Réparation et révision Composantes Hydrauliques et Mécaniques du Châssis pour le MDN

#### Tender Status

* **Current Status**: Expiré (French: Expiré)
* **Closing Date**: July 2nd, 2024 14:00:00 EDT
* **Note**: Previous Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time have been disregarded. All required documentation must be submitted by the new closing time.

#### Procurement Information

* **Source Procurement**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Category**: SRV
* **Expected Contract Dates**:
	+ **Contract Start Date**: Not specified
	+ **Contract End Date**: August 27, 2027

#### Location Information

* **Primary Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

#### Trade Agreements

* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
* **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)**
* **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
* **... and 9 more**

#### Contact Information

* **Primary Contact**: Chris Clark (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [chris.clark@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chris.clark@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Attachment and Notice

* **Notice URL**: N/A
* **Attachments**: N/A

#### Service Description
This notice is an amendment to the previous posting and reflects all necessary changes. Due to these changes, please disregard previous response dates for the Ariba Discovery posting. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the new closing date of July 2nd, 2024 at 14:00:00 EDT. Bids submitted after 14:00:00 EDT will be considered non-responsive.
